meanings.definition: The state of lacking a clear purpose or goal.
meanings.sent1: Her directionlessness in life made her feel lost and confused.
meanings.sent2: The directionlessness of the project led to delays and inefficiency.
meanings.sent3: His directionlessness was so extreme that he accidentally walked in circles.
meanings.sent4: The directionlessness of the ship left the crew feeling adrift in a vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The directionlessness of the maze made it impossible to find a way out.

meanings.definition: The quality of being aimless or without a specific direction.
meanings.sent1: The hiker's directionlessness caused him to wander off the trail.
meanings.sent2: The directionlessness of the conversation made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The cat's directionlessness while chasing its tail was both amusing and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The directionlessness of the wind carried the leaves in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The directionlessness of the clouds made it difficult to predict the weather.
